data.title: Wedding of Prince Hassan of Jordan, 1968
data.meta_description: https://www.instagram.com/p/CTGLwEPsCsg/ Happy 50th Anniversary to Prince Hassan and Princess Sarvath of Jordan, who got married on this day in Pakistani, Jordanian, and Western Ceremonies in Karachi, Pakistan on this day in 1968. data.text:
Embed from Getty Images

Happy 50th Anniversary to Prince Hassan and Princess Sarvath of Jordan, who got married on this day in Pakistani, Jordanian, and Western Ceremonies in Karachi, Pakistan on this day in 1968. The couple have four children, and were Crown Prince and Crown Princess of Jordan for over 30 years up until the last few months of King Hussein’s Reign.

(personal note- The family home of Princess Sarvath, where the wedding was held, is on the same street as my grandparent’s home in Karachi, which was used to house the Royal Guests)
